name: Pumpkin Orange Jam
description: Pumpkin cooks down so smoothly into a delicious jam or preserves.
recipeIngredient: 2  Valencia oranges (zest removed, and cut into segments)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the pumpkin, orange zest, orange segments, and sugar in a medium sauce-pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the pumpkin, orange zest, orange segments, and sugar in a medium sauce-pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil and then turn heat down to low.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a boil and then turn heat down to low.

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 35 min. or until the mixture has thickened.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for 35 min. or until the mixture has thickened.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash with a potato masher to dissolve any large pieces of pumpkin or orange.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash with a potato masher to dissolve any large pieces of pumpkin or orange.
